titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3222) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-287, by Mr. Cardoza.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3222 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 98.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 633, H. Res. 596 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 8/1/2007--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3222 (Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2008).
